content: --छंद {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} self-willed, uncontrolled, wanton. {2} spontaneous. {3} wild. (--दः one's own will or choice, own fancy or pleasure, independence. (--दं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} at one's own will or pleasure, wantonly, voluntarily; स्वच्छंदं दलदरविंद ते मरंदं विंदंतो विदधतु गुंजितं मिलिंदाः <ls>Bv. 1. 15.</ls>
